```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Show all publicly datasets that have been downloaded.

#### Load objects

```{r seed, message = FALSE}
set.seed(37)
```

```{r load, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse, quietly = TRUE)
library(Seurat, quietly = TRUE)
```

```{r manual, eval = FALSE, include = FALSE}

mus_weinreb_hspc <- readRDS("/omics/odcf/analysis/OE0538_projects/DO-0008/data/metadata/scRNAseq/03_sce_analysis/reclustering_bm/prepared/mus_weinreb_hspc")

```


```{r load_objects}

li_all_stromal <- snakemake@input[["li_all_stromal"]] # human stromal
ts_all_stromal <- snakemake@input[["ts_all_stromal"]] # human stromal
ts_bone_marrow <- snakemake@input[["ts_bone_marrow"]] # human HSPC fraction
ts_hscs_progenitors <- snakemake@input[["ts_hscs_progenitors"]] # human HSPC fraction

mus_weinreb_hspc <- snakemake@input[["mus_weinreb_hspc"]] # mouse HSPC fraction
mus_tm_bonemarrow <- snakemake@input[["mus_tm_bonemarrow"]] # mouse HSPC fraction

zeb_all_hspc <- snakemake@input[["zeb_all_hspc"]] # zebrafish HSPC fraction
nmr_sorted_hspc <- snakemake@input[["nmr_sorted_hspc"]] # naked mole rat HSPC fraction

```

## li_all_stromal

```{r li_all_stromal}
li_all_stromal
li_all_stromal@assays
li_all_stromal@assays$RNA
li_all_stromal@assays$RNA$counts[90:100,1:10] # RAW COUNTS
li_all_stromal@assays$RNA$data[90:100,1:10] # RAW COUNTSs

li_all_stromal@misc

head(li_all_stromal@meta.data)

li_all_stromal@reductions # has original PCA
DimPlot(li_all_stromal, group.by = "cell_type")
```

## ts_all_stromal

```{r ts_all_stromal}
ts_all_stromal
ts_all_stromal@assays
ts_all_stromal@assays$RNA
ts_all_stromal@assays$RNA$counts[90:100,1:10] # RAW COUNTS
ts_all_stromal@assays$RNA$data[90:100,1:10] # NORMALISED/LOGCOUNTSs

ts_all_stromal@misc

head(ts_all_stromal@meta.data)

ts_all_stromal@reductions # NO REDUCTIONS
```
